member.name: T:AM3.Configuration
member.summary: Provides helper methods for reading values from the configuration file.

member.name: T:AM3.HttpModuleBase
member.summary: Provides an abstract base class for that supports discovery from within partial trust environments. Originally developed by Atif Aziz, http://www.raboof.com

member.name: M:AM3.HttpModuleBase.OnInit(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Initializes the module and prepares it to handle requests.

member.name: M:AM3.HttpModuleBase.OnDispose
member.summary: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the module.

member.name: P:AM3.HttpModuleBase.SupportDiscoverability
member.summary: Determines whether the module will be registered for discovery in partial trust environments or not.

member.name: M:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.OnInit(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Initializes the module and prepares it to handle requests.

member.name: M:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.application_BeginRequest(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The handler called when a request is passed on to the module

member.name: M:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.application_AuthenticateRequest(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The handler called when the Identity of the user has been establised

member.name: M:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.GetConfig
member.summary: Gets the configuration object used by to read the settings for module.

member.name: P:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.Enabled
member.summary: Returns true if AM3 is enabled in the configuration file

member.name: P:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.LoginUrl
member.summary: Gets the relative path to the web applications login page

member.name: P:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.LandingPage
member.summary: Gets the relative path to the landing page that will be displayed to users when the AM3 is enabled.

member.name: P:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.AllowedRoles
member.summary: Gets a comma-delimited list of roles that will be allowed access.

member.name: P:AM3.MaintenanceModeModule.AllowedUsers
member.summary: Gets a comma-delimited list of users that will be allowed access.

member.name: M:AM3.Utility.MaskNullString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an empty string if the provided string is null

member.name: M:AM3.Utility.MaskEmptyString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Fills an empty string with the provided string
